title: Tree
description: Tree can render a tree of collapsable objects from either a JSON tree or a simple List via List.group

properties.name: container
properties.desc: selector where to create this object

properties.name: toggle
properties.desc: if tree items toggle on select

properties.name: drag_after
properties.desc: time in ms after which an item becomes drag-able

properties.name: types
properties.desc: the object defining the mode and icon per item

methods.name: selectItemByPropVal
methods.desc: select item given propery value pair

methods.name: updateSelectedItemDataProperty
methods.desc: update the value of a property of the selected item

methods.name: updateSelectedItemData
methods.desc: update the entire data object of the selected item

methods.name: updateSelectedItemLabel
methods.desc: update the label of the selected item

methods.name: deleteItemByPath
methods.desc: delete an item given its path

events.name: OGX.Tree.DRAG
events.desc: when an item is being dragged

events.name: OGX.Tree.DROP
events.desc: when an item is being drop
